title: RACK CONFIGURATION COMMAND
description:
This command allows the operator to configure the rack. The operator can 
configure the following parameter:
  - description: text that describes the location of the rack.
user_level:
The command can be accessed by operators with equipment privileges, and 
executed by operators with equipment privileges.
syntax: > configure equipment rack (index) [ no description | description <Description-127> ]

resource_parameters.name: (index)
resource_parameters.description: the physcial position of the rack

command_parameters.name: [no] description
command_parameters.description: any description to be used by the operator optional parameter with default value: "" - description to help the operator to identify the object - length: x<=127

raw:
help configure equipment rack
RACK CONFIGURATION COMMAND
==========================

Command Description
-------------------

This command allows the operator to configure the rack. The operator can 
configure the following parameter:
  - description: text that describes the location of the rack.


User Level
----------

The command can be accessed by operators with equipment privileges, and 
executed by operators with equipment privileges.

Command Syntax
--------------

The command has the following syntax:
> configure equipment rack (index) [ no description | description 
<Description-127> ]

Command Parameters
------------------

Table "Rack Configuration Command" Resource Parameters

Resource Identifier        Description

(index)                    the physcial position of the rack

Table "Rack Configuration Command" Command Parameters

Parameter                  Description

[no] description           any description to be used by the operator
                           optional parameter with default value: ""

                           Parameter type: <Description-127>
                           Format:
                           - description to help the operator to identify the 
object
                           - length: x<=127 


DS-LIN-TEST-01:automationuser>#
